messages.content: Going to the doctor tomorrow for a checkup to make sure everything is normal and hopefully this shit is just in my head.
Kings fan here, good luck to you guys! Will be an interesting game to watch!
Yeah you better hope. I just switched to combat pro from standard and I gotta say my builds are 🗿
Maybe they'll change their mind one day! That sounds good, I'll give it a go some time!
Now you have to make up all these downvotes with some low-hanging-fruit criticism comment of [NAME] or [NAME]. Good luck and cheers!
Shaving her legs, hoping the video didn’t cut short and that’s all she shaved in there....
I hope you are not living in Australia. That heat has been killing Masturbators left and right.
good luck with your baby! i hope everything goes well for you and your SO lol
I would hope that Cartoon Network would have nothing to do with it. Would hate to see them "Teen Titan" ASOIAF.
I have more faith in [NAME] than anyone on the court to make a 3. Strange world
No idea but as of last year there was a cat that liked to hang out there. Hope he’s okay ❤️
[NAME], [NAME] is starting a marriage with infidelity and drunk proposals. I hope a happy and long married life for him.
Just keep going and don't lose hope. Stuff like this can happen all the time to anybody. It's just bad luck
People have gotten triggered on this sub the past month if you didn't call [NAME] a [NAME], so I think we can handle it.
I plan on being respectful lol. I hope he’s there.
He’s gone soon I would imagine, hope we can get a late-mid round pick for him, like a 5th
I would hope the guy is genuine and honest, but in my circumstances, there's not much closure.
Lmao I hope I’m not the only one who gets this
[NAME] has had this problem forever. Hopefully she fixes it, because it gets old and is a relationship killer
This... This is where my journey ends. I was not able to make it to the end, good luck future redditors!
I hope your daughter gets the help she needs and someday gets better.
I would focus on being an enlisted Marine first. That’s what you’ll be doing for the next 4 years.
It did! Good luck on yours!! -[NAME]
If the cops arrested him, he must be guilty! (Good luck!! You got this!)
No superbowl @ lambo for this generation; hopefully global warming will make an impact in the next 30 years. :)
Let's hope January treats us a little better than December.
I hope for Irelands sake you're right.
Better hope nobody steals your keys
Wow. That was deep. I hope you make out well move on and find true love. Be strong
Oh I'd wager it was as addictive :-) 7x70's :-/
